ConfigurationOption.Value: select l.location, lm.metername, m.description, lm.active, lm.measureunitid, lm.avgcalcmethod, lm.slidingwindowsize, lm.sincelastrepair, lm.sincelastoverhaul, lm.sincelastinspect, lm.sinceinstall, lm.lifetodate, lm.changeby, lm.changedate, lm.remarks, lm.siteid, lm.orgid, lm.lastreadingdate, replace(lm.lastreading, ',', '' ) lastreading, lm.pointnum, lm.average, lm.readingtype, lm.lastreadinginspctr, lm.locationmeterid, lm.langcode, lm.hasld, m.domainid, m.metertype, p.loweraction, p.lowerwarning, p.upperaction, p.upperwarning, l.locationsid,m.meterid,p.measurepointid from locations l left join locationmeter lm on l.location = lm.location and l.siteid = lm.siteid left join meter m on lm.metername = m.metername left join measurepoint p on lm.location = p.location and lm.metername = p.metername and lm.pointnum = p.pointnum

Struct._value: := format( ${New Reading}, test(${Domain} is null, 'Numeric2', null ))

:= eval( ${New Reading} is null, null, ${Lower Action} is not null and ${New Reading} <= ${Lower Action}, "lower action", ${Upper Action} is not null and ${New Reading} >= ${Upper Action}, "upper action", ${Lower Warning} is not null and ${New Reading} <= ${Lower Warning}, "lower warning", ${Upper Warning} is not null and ${New Reading} >= ${Upper Warning}, "upper warning" )
${Meter Type} = 'CONTINUOUS' and ${New Reading} is not null

EventAction.Condition: ${Meter Type} = 'CONTINUOUS' and ${Reading Type} != 'DELTA' and ${New Reading} is not null and ( (${New Reading} * 1.0) < (${Last Reading} * 1.0) )

ConfigurationOption.Value: Did the meter roll over from the previous reading?

EventAction.Condition: ${Meter Type} = 'CONTINUOUS' and ${Reading Type} != 'DELTA' and ${New Reading} is not null and ( (${New Reading} * 1.0) < (${Last Reading} * 1.0) )

Struct._value: :='Reading '||${FORMAT_NEW_VALUE}||' '||${Measure Unit}||' is outside the defined '||${READING_LIMIT_TYPE}||' limit'

ConfigurationOption.Value: Reading ${FORMAT_NEW_VALUE} is outside the defined ${READING_LIMIT_TYPE} limit! Would you like to create a work order?

List.ListEntry: l.location in (select location from locancestor where ancestor = '${MX_WORK_LOCATION}' and siteid = '${MX_CURRENT_SITE}' ) and l.type = 'OPERATING'
